content: house plants need lots of good light add a tassel to make a cute bookmark this scene is from week 2 of the itty bitty group s 2024 german christmas village kal the other 2 patterns are fairy village and tiny nutcrackers to attach the streetlamp to the house i pushed a toothpick though the middle of the lamp and into the side of the house i did this on a slant so it wouldn t poke out the other side i also used a toothpick for the nutcracker s flaming stick and just pushed it through his arm 4
